about_the_game:
Welcome to Jessica’s Choices – Origins.

Your Story, Your Choices, Your Gameplay

Jessica's Choices - Origins is a fully choice driven experience where every decision shapes your story. The game currently offers 5-8 hours of gameplay, but its depth comes from the branching paths and alternate scenarios that unlock with different choices.

Replayability is key—whether you're exploring Jessica's pure, submissive, or rebellious sides, each path offers unique outcomes and interactions. Spamming the spacebar or skipping dialogue may rush the experience, but doing so could miss the heart of the story: the consequences of your actions.

I encourage players to immerse themselves in the world and discover the depth of their decisions. The game is designed for replayability, giving you the option to see lots of different choices, choose different routes and experience a different kind of game with each playthrough.

This is the official first game of my Jessica's Choices mini universe which will see choices made in this game impact the future games (Forced, Prison and RED). Within this game, you will find achievements based on your choices a gallery view from some of the hottest scenes and character stats screen based on the choices you make for Jessica or her surroundings. Your choices matter.

There are four distinct ways to play through this game and the games to follow which the walkthrough will assist you on your journey. Either keeping Jessica pure from corruption, leading her down a lesbian path, letting her experience all that her world has to offer or turning the world against her. The choice is up to you.

This is a full package game, and all future updates will be provided within this package.

content_descriptors.notes:
All sexual characters are depicted as 18 and over.

Jessica's choices - Origins is intended for adults only. It includes explicit, sexual content that some gamers may find offensive. This is an adult fantasy game where characters, story, and actions are all fictitious.

This story contains adult themes. It depicts acts of lesbian, bondage, torture and group sex. It contains acts such as sexual assault/non-consensual sex and vanilla.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OpenGL 2, DirectX 9, OpenGL ES 2, or WebGL
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.15 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

name: Jessica's Choices - Origins [Episode5]

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

reviews:
“V0.1 Very early into this games development and I'll update this as new releases come out, but I have read the story and been a long time follower of DoAdventures. Back when they were Doadventures.10 on Chyoa Pros: As the first official game in the Jessica’s Choices mini-series, DoAdventures introduces the players to a world where decisions matter and consequences ripple across the subsequent titles. (I can't wait to have RED in my possession again) Jessica is HOT! Easily one of the hottest MC's on the site. In game stats that reflect your choices Did I mention that Jessica is hot! Really good use of the model. Cons: Lack of sound and animation (I hope animation will be added soon) Not a lot of content yet Jessica’s Choices - Origins lays a solid foundation, leaving me eager for more and looking forward to the scenes I have happily jerked off to many times in the reading format. I would recommend anyone to have a shot of this VN, and game that isn't afraid to put all the fetishes up front and centre.”
4/5 – F95

“The game is very good and every choice matter and will make a difference in the story. This is the first game I see that does that, it's a lot of work for the dev, but the game is very good. I just wish we get more frequent updates.”
5/5 – F95
short_description: In this multiple choice visual novel and the first official game of the Jessica's Choices mini universe, you will see choices made in this game impact the future games - Forced, Prison before culminating in RED.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian
